name: FoodProcess-Lab
short_description:
FoodProcess-Lab is an open-source extension to the Konstanz Information Miner (KNIME) and PMM-Lab. 
The purpose of this tool is to combine predictive microbial models with processes of the food and feed industries (e.g. breweries, dairy factories). 
This tool tracks the steps of a “food process-chain” to trace the growth or inactivation of microbial contaminants.
Its intention is to help the food- and feed industry to monitor microbial development in production processes and public authorities to assess risks.   
FoodProcess-Lab has been initiated and provided by the Federal Institute for Risk Assessment - BfR (Berlin, Germany). The software is in Beta status. Before using the software you have to read and accept the license and disclaimer. If you do not agree, do not use this software.
